textBeforeTable: Table 1: List of Places in Houghton le Spring Registration District Registers currently held at : Sunderland and County of Durham districts. GRO volumes : XXIV (1837-51), 10a (1852-1938). Sub-districts : Hetton le Hole, Houghton le Spring. Abolished : 1.7.1938 (to become part of Durham Northern, Durham Eastern, Durham Central, and Sunderland registration districts). Created : 1.7.1837. Registration County : Durham. HOUGHTON LE SPRING REGISTRATION DISTRICT List of Districts GENUKI Contents
textAfterTable: Table 2: Boundary Changes affecting Houghton le Spring Registration District Date of Change Note Description of Change Population transferred 21.12.1881 (a) Gained a part of the parish of West Rainton (which until 21.12.1881 formed a detached part of the parish of Pittington) from Durham registration district. 218 in 1881 1.4.1928 (b) Lost part of the parish of Silksworth (which became part of the parish of Sunderland on 1.4.1928) to Sunderland registration district. 54 in 1921 1.7.1938 (abolished) (c) Lost the parishes of Moor House and West Rainton to Durham Central registration district. 2324 in 1931 (d) Lost the parishes of East & Middle Herrington, Oflerton, Silksworth, Warden Law, and West Herrington, to Durham Eastern registration district. 2673 in 1931 (e) Lost the parishes of Hetton and Houghton le Spring to Durham Northern registration district. 50503 in 1931 (f) Lost part of the parish of Silksworth (which became part of the parish of Sunderland on 1.4.1937) to Sunderland registration district. 64 in 1931 ©
